<h1 align="center">
  Visualizing Design Token Abstraction
</h1>

## 🚀 Quick start

1.  **Install dependencies.**

    First, make sure that node and npm are installed. Then navigate into the project's directory and install dependencies.

    ```shell
    npm install
    ```

2.  **Build visualization.**

    Second, run the following command to build the project.

    ```shell
    npm run build
    ```

3.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Third, serve the built project onto a local server!

    ```shell
    npm run serve
    ```

    The visualization should now be running at `http://localhost:9000`!

## 🧐 What's inside?

A quick look at the top-level files and directories you'll see in this project.

    .
    ├── node_modules
    ├── src
    ├── .gitignore
    ├── .prettierrc
    ├── gatsby-browser.js
    ├── gatsby-config.js
    ├── gatsby-node.js
    ├── gatsby-ssr.js
    ├── LICENSE
    ├── package-lock.json
    ├── package.json
    └── README.md

1.  **`/src`**: This directory contains all of the code related to the visualization. The core files are housed under componenents/viz. The data is under src/data/
